|brand = Intel |model = PRO |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = /Wireless 7100 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = WM3B7100 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AB65 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = Type IIIB
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PD9WM3B2100A |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = PB C12761-002 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:04:23
|chip1 = Intel;531-ME;531-ME, APOP2047, 002, (M)(C)2001, KOREA; |chip2 = Symbol;51-23130-130;SYMBOL, DELAWARE 1.0, 51-23130-130, X-1.2, X-E1BA9XVW; |chip3 = Philips;SA2400A;SA2400ABE; |chip4 = Intel;82531RE;82531RE, L219J14Q, Q358ES, (M)(C)2002;
|antconn = U.FL |antenna2 = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 2.4GHz RFIC;Philips;SA2400ABE;;1; ,,, 5GHz RFIC;Intel;82531RE;82531RE, L219J14Q, Q358ES, 2002; |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = ab |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = not in the US |fccapprovdate = 05/29/2003 |estreldate = 08/2002 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = Malaysia
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This card was never distributed in the States. It may be have been used in Japan and a few other countries..
This device (particularly, an ES model WM3B7100 card - '''PB C12761-002''' + date code of '''3002''' [July 2002]) is silkscreened on the card) is using... *An '''Intel''' MAC marked "531-ME", "APOP2047", "002", "(M)(C)2001", "KOREA", presumably '''Ardon1.5''' *A '''Symbol''' baseband processor marked "SYMBOL", "DELAWARE 1.0", "51-23130-130", "X-1.2", "X-E1BA9XVW" *A '''Philips''' SA2400ABE 2.4 GHz RFIC *An '''Intel''' 5 GHz RFIC marked "82531RE", "L219J14Q", "Q358ES", "(M)(C)2002", [http://pc.watch.impress.co.jp/docs/2003/0314/cent05.htm appears to be codenamed '''Ramon'''] :[http://pc.watch.impress.co.jp/docs/2003/0314/cent05.htm Appears to be codenamed ''Ramon'']
:See also: [[Intel PRO/Wireless 2100A]] (''Calexico'')
